verses.verse: Yahweh,<WH3068> you have been favorable<WH7521> to your land.<WH776> You have restored<WH7725> the fortunes<WH7622> of Jacob.<WH3290>
You have forgiven<WH5375> the iniquity<WH5771> of your people.<WH5971> You have covered<WH3680> all their sin.<WH2403> Selah.<WH5542>
You have taken away<WH622> all your wrath.<WH5678> You have turned<WH7725> from the fierceness<WH2740> of your anger.<WH639>
Turn<WH7725> us,<WH430> God of our salvation,<WH3468> and cause your indignation<WH3708> toward us to cease.<WH6565>
Will you be angry<WH599> with us forever?<WH5769> Will you draw out<WH4900> your anger<WH639> to all<WH1755> generations?<WH1755>
Won't<WH2421> you revive us again,<WH7725> that your people<WH5971> may rejoice in you?<WH8055>
Show<WH7200> us your loving kindness,<WH2617> Yahweh.<WH3068> Grant<WH5414> us your salvation.<WH3468>

I will hear<WH8085> what God,<WH410> Yahweh,<WH3068> will speak,<WH1696> for he will speak<WH1696> peace<WH7965> to his people,<WH5971> his saints;<WH2623> but let them not turn again<WH7725> to folly.<WH3690>
Surely his salvation<WH3468> is near<WH7138> those who fear<WH3373> him,<WH3519> that glory may dwell<WH7931> in our land.<WH776>
Mercy<WH2617> and truth<WH571> meet together.<WH6298> Righteousness<WH6664> and peace<WH7965> have kissed each other.<WH5401>
Truth<WH571> springs out<WH6779> of the earth.<WH776> Righteousness<WH6664> has looked down<WH8259> from heaven.<WH8064>
Yes,<WH3068> Yahweh will give<WH5414> that which is good.<WH2896> Our land<WH776> will yield<WH5414> its increase.<WH2981>
Righteousness<WH6664> goes<WH1980> before<WH6440> him,<WH7760> And prepares the way<WH1870> for his steps.<WH6471>
